mapper.select: select uid from user_login where telephone=#{telephone}
select uid,username,telephone,password,password_salt passwordSalt,status,time,pay_password payPassword from user_login where telephone=#{telephone} and status=#{status}
select lid,email,password,status,current_time from login where email=#{email} and password=#{password} and status=1;
select r.rid,r.rname from employee e INNER JOIN emp_role er on e.eid=er.eid INNER JOIN role r on er.rid=r.rid where e.lid=1
